mapper.select: SELECT a.* , e.EMPL_NAME FROM ALARM a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.AL_PRODUCER = e.EMPL_ID WHERE AL_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND AL_FLAG = 1 ORDER BY AL_DATE DESC

SELECT a.*, e.EMPL_NAME AS PRODUCER_NAME, e2.EMPL_NAME AS TARGET_NAME FROM ALARM a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.AL_PRODUCER = e.EMPL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON a.AL_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID WHERE AL_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND AL_FLAG = 3 AND AL_TARGET = #{al_target}

SELECT a.* , e.EMPL_NAME AS PRODUCER_NAME, e2.EMPL_NAME AS TARGET_NAME FROM ALARM a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.AL_PRODUCER = e.EMPL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON a.AL_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID WHERE AL_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND AL_FLAG = 4 AND AL_TARGET = #{al_target}

SELECT a.* , e.EMPL_NAME AS PRODUCER_NAME, e2.EMPL_NAME AS TARGET_NAME FROM ALARM a JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.AL_PRODUCER = e.EMPL_ID JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON a.AL_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID WHERE AL_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND AL_FLAG = 5 AND AL_TARGET = #{al_target}

SELECT a.* , e.EMPL_NAME AS PRODUCER_NAME, e2.EMPL_NAME AS TARGET_NAME, sdt.SIDT_TEMP_NAME AS TEMPLATE FROM ALARM a FULL OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e ON a.AL_PRODUCER = e.EMPL_ID FULL OUTER JOIN EMPLOYEE e2 ON a.AL_TARGET = e2.EMPL_ID FULL OUTER JOIN SIGN_DOC_BOX sdb ON a.AL_KEY = sdb.SIDB_DOC_NUM FULL OUTER JOIN SIGN_DOC_TEMP sdt ON sdb.SIDT_TEMP_CD = sdt.SIDT_TEMP_CD WHERE AL_DATE >= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND AL_SET = 'Y' AND AL_TARGET = #{al_target} ORDER BY AL_DATE DESC
